name: Pyramid
storyline:
Declassified documents from a secret research project reveal that the dream realm consists of multiple layers.

While regular and lucid dreams occur near the surface, deeper layers constitute a shared reality and can only be accessed by specially trained agents and mystics or by the means of deep space travel.

It is hypothesized that at the bottom of the labyrinth there is a pyramid-like object, although no researchers have been able to locate it yet.
summary: This is a short vapowave/horror first person adventure, completion time is around 10 minutes. It is inspired by Control, Severance and my experience working in a business corporation, so if you're into these things, you might enjoy this game too. This is the first part of a bigger experience, the following parts will come soon.
